scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ. Christ is shown on the cross, with blood dripping from his wounds. A figure on a ladder is attending to Christ, possibly anointing him or removing him from the cross. Below, the Virgin Mary, supported by another woman, grieves. A bearded man in blue and red robes stands to the right, observing the scene. In the background, rolling hills are visible, with a town or city featuring buildings with pitched roofs and towers in the distance. The overall scene is set outdoors.
